WRITING.TEXT:
Thanks for the advice love!
That actually made more sense than all the YouTube videos I have been pouring over. lol
Thanks so much love! Yeah I was trying to take the advice, but I still struggle with...I think maybe it's the play of light on skin? Not sure if there is a better word for that?

Thanks love!
I'm always on the hunt for more art books!

WRITING.TITLE: Molly. Watercolor, acrylic, ink, and colored pencils. Watercolor block. 12 in x 16 in
